probablyOutdated.text: The state of this page is probably outdated. Please close it and run this shortcut again.

editSnippets.title: Edit Snippets
editSnippets.description: Edit your saved snippets and clipboard items

help.title: Help
help.description: If you are lost, start here

icloudUrls.title: iCloud URLs
icloudUrls.description: All generated iCloud URLs used to import the finished shortcuts

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved changes
unsavedChanges.message: You've modified the $list which hasn't been saved to the shortcuts app yet.
unsavedChanges.looseChanges: You will loose these changes if you reload or close this page without saving!

selectShortcuts.title: Select Shortcuts
selectShortcuts.nothingAvailable: No shortcuts found (not possible, because this shortcut exists)

confirmSelectedShortcuts.title: Confirm selected shortcuts
confirmSelectedShortcuts.shortcutsSizeLarge:
The selected shortcuts are quite large ($size). The Shortcuts app or Safari may crash if too much data is transferred.
Do you want to continue?
confirmSelectedShortcuts.shortcutsLoaded:
All selected shortcuts are already loaded.
Do you want to continue and use them or reload them?

Note that they are outdated when you've changed them since starting this Shortcut!

rebuildInfo.message:
Have you got a `gzip decompression failed` error?
Try it again or
rebuildInfo.suggestGoToMainMenu: Otherwise just go to the main menu with the button down below

processShortcuts.title: Processing your shortcuts
processShortcuts.noItemsFound:
No snippets or inserts were found.
Please check, if you have the correct syntax in the comment actions.
processShortcuts.errorMessage: There was an error while analysing your shortcuts:

analyserWarnings.title: Warnings
analyserWarnings.noItemsFound: No further snippets or inserts found.
analyserWarnings.incomplete: The CopyPaste Actions comment is inclomplete.
analyserWarnings.wrongFunction:
Wrong function name.
Expected one of $functionDefinition but got `$function` instead.
analyserWarnings.pauseResumeInPaste: Found function `$function` in a `paste replace` section, which is not supported.
analyserWarnings.pauseResumeInInsert: Found function `$function` in an `insert replace` section, which is not supported.
analyserWarnings.duplicateClipboardNoName: There is already a clipboard item without a name.
analyserWarnings.duplicateClipboardWithName: There is already a clipboard item with the name `$name`.
analyserWarnings.duplicateSnippetNoName: There is already a snippet without a name.
analyserWarnings.duplicateSnippetWithName: There is already a snippet with the name `$name`.
analyserWarnings.pasteEndNoStart: Found the end of a `paste replace` section without any start.
analyserWarnings.insertEndNoStart: Found the end of an `insert replace` section without any start.
analyserWarnings.pasteEndInsertStart: Found the end of a `paste replace` section without any start. Maybe you meant `end insert`?
analyserWarnings.insertEndPasteStart: Found the end of an `insert replace` section without any start. Maybe you meant `end paste`?
analyserWarnings.funcNoStart:
Found function `$function` without any start.
Possible reasons:
* Maybe you specified a number after the start function (e.g. `copy 5` to copy only the next 5 actions) and forgot to remove this function.
* There was an error with the start comment.
* You forgot to specify `end paste` or `end insert` to end a paste/an insert range.
* You have used a name at the start funtction and forgot to specify the name at this function.
analyserWarnings.funcClipboardFinished:
Found function `$function` after the clipboard item has already finished.
Maybe you've specified a count on the start function (e.g. `copy 5`) that finished before reaching the current function.
analyserWarnings.funcSnippetFinished:
Found function `$function` after the snippet has already finished.
Maybe you've specified a count on the start function (e.g. `save 5`) that finished before reaching the current function.
analyserWarnings.pauseWhilePauseClipboard: Found function `pause` while the current clipboard item is already paused.
analyserWarnings.pauseWhilePauseSnippet: Found function `pause` while the current snippet is already paused.
analyserWarnings.resumeWhileResumeClipboard: Found function `resume` while the current clipboard item is already continuing.
analyserWarnings.resumeWhileResumeSnippet: Found function `resume` while the current snippet is already continuing.

foundSnippets.title: Found Snippets
foundSnippets.noSnippetsFound: No Snippets or Clipboard Items found
foundSnippets.resolveConflicts: Please resolve the conflicts shown at the top before continuing
foundSnippets.finishEditing: You have started editing a snippet or clipboard item. Please save or cancle your edits before continuing

deleteMessage.clipboard:
Do you really want to delete this clipboard item?
The change needs to be saved manually to the shortcuts app! You can restore this clipboard item by closing this page and running the shortcut again as long as you haven't saved the changes.
deleteMessage.snippet:
Do you really want to delete this snippet?
The change needs to be saved manually to the shortcuts app! You can restore this snippet by closing this page and running the shortcut again as long as you haven't saved the changes.

normal.clipboard: This overrides the following clipboard item:

subjunctive.clipboard: This would override the following clipboard item:
subjunctive.snippet: This would override the following snippet:

foundInserts.title: Found Inserts
foundInserts.noInserts: No insert was found in any shortcut

inserts.clipboard: This will insert the following clipboard item:
inserts.snippet: This will insert the following snippet:

foundInserts.insertWithoutSnippetOrNotExcluded: At least one insert has no snippet assigned (or mark it as _Do not process this_)

mergeSnippetsIntoShortcut.title: Merging your snippets
mergeSnippetsIntoShortcut.noItemsFound: You're done! There is nothing to insert in any shortcut and no snippet or clipboard selection removed any actions.
mergeSnippetsIntoShortcut.unsavedChanges: However there are unsaved changes. To save them, the Shortcuts app has to be opened.
mergeSnippetsIntoShortcut.errorMessage: There was an error while merging your snippets into the shortcuts:

importShortcuts.title: Shortcuts to import
importShortcuts.note: $n shortcuts have to be imported. Please tap on the button _Import_ to import a shortcut. After importing one shortcut, return to this page to import the next one. You can also tap on the shortcut itself to import it.

preferences.title: Preferences

nIconsCached.noIconNoShortcut: Currently there is no icon in the cache and no shortcut without an icon.
nIconsCached.noIconSingularShortcut: Currently there is no icon in the cache and $shortcuts shortcut without an icon.
nIconsCached.noIconPluralShortcut: Currently there is no icon in the cache and $shortcuts shortcuts without an icon.
nIconsCached.singularIconNoShortcut: Currently there is $icons icon in the cache and no shortcut without an icon.
nIconsCached.singularIconSingularShortcut: Currently there is $icons icon in the cache and $shortcuts shortcut without an icon.
nIconsCached.singularIconPluralShortcut: Currently there is $icons icon in the cache and $shortcuts shortcuts without an icon.
nIconsCached.pluralIconNoShortcut: Currently there are $icons icons in the cache and no shortcut without an icon.
nIconsCached.pluralIconSingularShortcut: Currently there are $icons icons in the cache and $shortcuts shortcut without an icon.
nIconsCached.pluralIconPluralShortcut: Currently there are $icons icons in the cache and $shortcuts shortcuts without an icon.

preferences.refreshIconCacheNote: Refreshing the cache may take several minutes depending on the number of shortcuts on your device.

autoOpenApp.title: Automatically open Shortcuts
autoOpenApp.description: When the app should be opened to e.g. load, import or save snippets you will be redirected to Shortcuts without an interaction from you.

excludeAllCPAComments.title: Exclude functions
excludeAllCPAComments.description: Exclude the functions (special comment actions) this shortcut works with from being included in other snippets and clipboard items. When deactivated, the comment actions will be copied, if they are included in a selection.

cleanUp.title: Clean up of functions
cleanUp.description:
Controls the removal of functions (special comment actions) after being processed.
Functions that contain an error and threw a warning are never removed.

values.1: Remove functions `pause`, `resume` and `end` when they are part of a selection started with `cut`, `save remove`, `paste replace` or `insert replace`
values.3: Remove all, but only when other actions are added or removed

commentMarker.title: Comment marker
commentMarker.description: The special marker on the first line of the comment that tells this shortcut to parse the comment.

includeShortcutImages.title: Load shortcut icons
includeShortcutImages.description:
Load the cached icons every time this shortcut is executed.
Needs the cache to be refreshed manually at the top of the preferences page when new shortcuts have been added or one icon was changed.

codeZoom.title: Zoom level of snippet contents
codeZoom.description: Controls the zoom level of snippet contents. Can also be changed on the corresponding page.

switchCaption.title: Caption on switches
switchCaption.description: Display a caption on switches like in iOS Settings app.

skipFoundInsertsOnNoInsert.title: Skip _Found Inserts_ page
skipFoundInsertsOnNoInsert.description: Skip the _Found Inserts_ page when no insert was found in any shortcut.

autoOverwriteSnippets.title: Automatically save all snippets
autoOverwriteSnippets.description:
Automatically saves all snippets overwriting already existing snippets and clipboard items.
This preference is ignored when there are name conflicts between new snippets/clipboard items.

autoLoadShortcuts.title: Load specific shortcuts every time
autoLoadShortcuts.description:
Automatically load specific shortcuts that you are using often with this shortcut. This way you don't have to bounce back to the Shortcuts app to load them for processing.
Previously selected shortcuts that were renamed/deleted and thus are missing are automatically deselected when you update the selection.

autoAnalyseShortcuts.title: Automatically analyse auto-loaded shortcuts
autoAnalyseShortcuts.description: Automatically analyse the auto-loaded shortcuts when this shortcut is run. You will need to confirm this to give you a way to turn this setting off again.

autoAcceptInserts.title: Automatically accept all inserts
autoAcceptInserts.description:
Automatically accept all found inserts with their matching snippet/clipboard item. If there are none then this acts also as if the preference _Skip Found Inserts page_ is enabled.
This preference is ignored when there are inserts with no matching snippet/clipboard item.

closePageTimeout.title: Close page automatically after
closePageTimeout.description: The page is closed automatically after this amount of seconds after you have been redirected to the shortcuts app. If you get the `gzip decompression failed` error and the page was already closed as you switched back to Safari then increase this. Keep in mind that if this is too long Safari might already be unloaded by iOS and therefore the tab won't be closed.

prefAutoLoadShortcuts.note: Please select the shortcuts you want to autmatically load on every execution of this shortcut. To cancel the selection go one page back.

prefLanguage.title: Change language
prefLanguage.message: Please note that you have to save your changes to the Shortcuts app before the language is applied.

listiCloudUrls.title: Generated iCloud URLs
listiCloudUrls.note: Here are listed all iCloud URLs that were generated by this shortcut. You can tap on one to open and import it again or deactivate the link. After deactivating it in Shortcuts, you have to delete it manually here and then save it to Shortcuts.
listiCloudUrls.copyFailed: Copying failed. Please copy it manually:
listiCloudUrls.deleteNote:
Do you really want to delete this URL?
Afterwards you need to save the changes with Shortcuts. When that is done there is no way of restoring the URL again (unless you save it yourself somewhere).

confirmAutoAnalyser.title: Analyse auto-loaded shortcuts?
confirmAutoAnalyser.message:
You've enabled to automatically analyse the auto-loaded shortcuts.
Do you want to proceed?
confirmAutoAnalyser.noShortcuts: You've enabled to automatically analyse the auto-loaded shortcuts, but no shortcuts were selected to be automatically loaded or they haven't been found.

missingShortcuts.title: Missing shortcuts!
missingShortcuts.message: Some shortcuts weren't found but should've been loaded (maybe you've renamed/deleted them):

firstRun.message:
Thank you for checking out my shortcut!

It seems like this is the first time you're executing this shortcut. Do you want to view the _Get Started_ guide?

P.S.: You can use the browser history to navigate between the menus!
